vote.title: A resolution (1) declaring approximately 17,647 square feet of improved land unwanted and unneeded, located at the intersection of Marilla and South St. Paul Streets, and authorizing its advertisement for sale by public auction; (2) establishing a reserve for the auctioned surplus property; (3) authorizing a Purchase and Sale Agreement to be prepared for the auctioned surplus property receiving highest qualified bid that meets or exceeds the reserve; and (4) authorizing the conveyance of a deed in a form acceptable to City Attorney  - Estimated Revenue: General Capital Reserve Fund ($2,395,360.00) and General Fund ($7,500.00) (Current Dallas Central Appraisal District value)
